text: Judith Nneka Chime (born 20 May 1978 in Lagos) is a Nigerian former football goalkeeper. She played for the Nigeria women's national football team. In 1999, she played in the FIFA Women's World Cup. She also played in the 2000 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==Other websites== * * 999 * Clayton State player profile * soccerpunter * womensfootballarchive * allafrica.com Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Nigerian footballers Category:FIFA World Cup players
title: Judith Chime
